title: Katie Price shows off her kinky underwear collection but admits she's 'boring in bed'
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Katie Price has built up quite the collection of underwear and gave her fans a sneak peek in her latest YouTube video.

The former glamour model, 41, is currently renovating her Horsham house so all her clothes are in messy piles or put away in suitcases, boxes or bin bags.

Despite her kinky clobber, Katie admits that she is actually pretty "boring" in the bedroom.

While she was giving a tour of her mucky mansion she ran into three assistants sorting through her knicker collection, and decided to show them off.

"Don't you think I'm obsessed with underwear?" she asks them.

(Image: Youtube)

(Image: Youtube)

In the suitcase are dozens of pairs of knickers, suspenders and dressing up outfits.

She has costumes so she can dress up like Wonder Woman, a nurse and a sailor.

The mum-of-five also holds up crotchless pants, a pink baby doll and corsets.

(Image: Youtube)

(Image: Youtube)

There is also a pair of satin underwear with her name on "just to remind people who I am".

Katie says she prefers wearing matching underwear and likes to make an effort with her attire in the bedroom.

She explains: "Would you think I'm boring bed looking at all this? You wouldn't think I'd be boring in bed.

(Image: Youtube)

"I'm so bloody boring.

"This is behind the scenes. Lots of girls talk the talk but you can actually see the real deal that I do actually love underwear and stuff.

"A girl's gotta dress up for her man, you know?"
description: Katie, 41, showed fans dozens of pairs of knickers, suspenders and dressing up outfits which are littered around her house
